items.value: Man Meme Coin

A sentient coin resembling a certain someone.
Will reward those who chase down and touch it with a few special goodies!
Flamin' Hot Cheepers
Cherry BSODA
Ultimate Apple
Can of Mangles
(1) Can of Mangles
(2) Can of Mangles
(3) Can of Mangles

Flamin' Hot Cheepers
A bag of cheesy puffs with incredible spice.
Their spices will indeed put you into a short, firey rush!

Cherry BSODA
A special limited-edition flavored BSODA!
Its unique cherry fizz will propel you as if you were a golf ball!

Ultimate Apple
Baldi may surely take longer to eat it, but that apple is like no other!
Make sure you're really out of his distance by the time he's done!

Can of Mangles
Hmm, that brand name sounds pretty familiar! Eat a few of these chips to gain a
burst of energy, whether you're in a rush or saving it for later!
The Man Meme Coin will appear in one of the many floors in Hide-and-Seek, so try catching it when you have the chance!
While fleeing, the Man Meme Coin will speed up based on your current movement speed. Take advantage of corners and dead-ends to help you catch it!
Eating the Flamin' Hot Cheepers will make you warm while in the Cold School event!
You can bash through windows while under the effect of the Flamin' Hot Cheepers!
You can get out of a Cherry BSODA spray if it overshoots!
Baldi prefers regular apples over possibly unhealthy Ultimate Apples!
*Boing!*
